Pull request checklist:
- [ ] Code is clean.
- [ ] Change/Fix is thoroughly tested.
- [ ] No additional error produced in the console.
- [ ] Only single commit with concise commit message.
- [ ] Proper issue linked
- [ ] Proper labels added
